ValidationRule.description: must have legal entity country and state for large requests
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND(
NOT($Setup.Automation_Settings__c.Disable_Validation_Rules__c), $Permission.Upmarket_Stuffs, Program__r.Use_Upmarket__c, CONTAINS(TEXT(Credit_Decision__c),'Approved'),
OR( Projected_Monthly_Spend__c>=150000, Credit_Line_Requested__c>=150000 ),
OR( ISBLANK(TEXT(Account__r.Legal_Entity_Country__c)), ISBLANK(Account__r.Legal_Entity_State__c) )
)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: For large credit requests, the Legal Entity Country and State must be selected on the Account.
